item.title: Need help with a Command!
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:1, topic:463707”]I need a real definition for a Command {PI} Tryed it already but not really much experienced with commands like that [c2]

} if (playerCommand.equals("active") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(2683, 3725, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Thanks for Helping the Players!"); Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];//Tryed it like i said c2.sendMessage("Staff member "+c.playerName+" is in Helpzone!"); } [/quote]
You have to make the command loop through all of the players.

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
			if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {

The if-statement checks to see if that player is actually online; if it didn’t you would probably get a NullPointerException, since the message can’t be sent to players that are offline.

Read full topic
